item.title: ‘Homestead’ Is Proof Christian Films Are Getting Better — But There’s Room For Improvement
item.description: With 'Homestead,' Angel Studios has set out to embrace a kind of dark storytelling but with a Christian edge.

item.title: Vivek’s Plan To Turn Ohio Into Silicon Valley Shows He Doesn’t Understand My State At All
item.description: In Vivek Ramaswamy’s long-awaited announcement of his run for governor, I was struck by how little substance he offered.

item.title: How To Make Yourself Invincible To Media Info Ops
item.description: The most effective tactic for not getting duped by the media's information operations is to understand that they happen.

item.title: Illinois Democrat Bill Would Legalize Women Selling Their Bodies For Money
item.description: The bill ignores the intimacy and vulnerability intrinsic in sex, and the emotional damage sex can wield outside the bounds of love

item.title: Trump Killed ‘Bidenbucks’ — Congress Needs To Bury It
item.description: Without congressional action, the next leftist leading the executive branch could easily bring back Bidenbucks.
